name: AspectRatio
description: Container that maintains a consistent width-to-height ratio for responsive media and content

accessibility.screenReader: No specific screen reader behavior. Content within the aspect ratio container should have appropriate alt text or labels.

recommendedUsage: Use for embedding responsive images, videos, maps, or other media that require consistent proportions across different viewport sizes. Common ratios: 16/9 (video), 4/3 (classic), 1/1 (square).
antiPatterns: Do not use for text-heavy content where natural height flow is preferred. Avoid using when content should grow based on its intrinsic size.
